title: Provide Kubernetes and Openshift convinience tasks as CLI plugins
body:
### Description

There are tasks like:

- Binding an application to service (using SBO or other means)
- Portforwarding
- Exec into a container
- Get application container logs

That either require handcrafting kubenretes resources, or using the `kubectl` binary to run commands that usually require some knowledge on the internals of the deployemnt (e.g. container names, ports etc).

It would be great if the was a CLI plugin that simplified all these tasks.

Especially, the part about binding is something that is far from trivial and can be a headache for the user.
